ygData.messageBody:
Aiya I played since the 1st few days of release of UO in Singaproe...that
time blur blur no where to go so anyhow choose one server...merns managed
to find a few singaporean...Ferns is one of them...

>I can only say, u went to the wrong UO shards, hehe. Baja and few newer
>japanese shards has quite a number of local players. Our guild in Baja now
>even maintain at the top 2 biggest guilds ;)
>

SPECIAL: Go to http://home.pacific.net.sg/~dexterwong/friends.html and send
it to your friends. You'll be suprised how many true friends you have!
